channel.title: Rs2 server + forums
channel.description:
I am searching source with mysql coded in. So if you make forum account its also you ingame account, like dodian has.
Does anybody know sources like that or where i can download them?

item.title: Rs2 server + forums
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

If your looking to build your server onto a phpnuke page or smfforfree4, well you’ll have to decide as each are not the same.

First, if you chose PHP, then go download “Easy PHP” create a new database - with user and password and get the URL, and upload your database from the server.

But make sure you put in the name, and password and URL which is near the top of the database for your server so it acutully connect.

Read full topic
